subject: Basketball
Madison Square Garden
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Raptors’ Chris Bosh is averaging a career-high 24 points and 11.3 rebounds so far this season, and this summer the Knicks will likely try to lure him to New York.
